colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @040B (CES PA 'DI NI ZHI KHRO'I RNAMS KYI DMIGS RIM THUN MONGS MA YIN PA'I TSUL SEMS KYI @041A *, ,'KHRUL PA'I DRI MA BKRU BAR BEYD PA'I DKYIL 'KHOR GSAL BYED ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, RANG GI BRJED RKYANG DBYANG DANG SKAL PA RNAMS KYI SLOB MA MANG PO RNAMS KYIS BSTAN 'GRO PHAN PA'I BSAM PAS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, ^CHOS RJES THA SHAL BLO BZANG BSKAL BZANG MING CAN GYIS BLA MA GONG MA RNAMS KYI GSUNGS RGYUN ZHAL SHES MTHONG BRGYUD LAG LEN RNAMS LAS BSGRIGS PA LA BLA MA LHA DANG SPYAN LDAN MKHAS PA'I TSOGS KYIS BZOD PAR MDZAD DU GSOL, YI GE PA NI BLO BZANG PHUN TSOGS SO, ,DGE'O,, ,,LEGS SO,, ,,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
